sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import AddButton from "./AddButton"; import "./SmallStatBlock.css"; class SmallStatBlock extends React.Component { render() { const conjure = this.props.conjure; return (

{conjure.name}

{conjure.size} fey
AC {conjure.AC}
HP {conjure.HP}
Spd {conjure.Speed}
STR
{conjure.Stats.STR}
DEX
{conjure.Stats.DEX}
CON
{conjure.Stats.CON}
INT
{conjure.Stats.INT}
WIS
{conjure.Stats.WIS}
CHA
{conjure.Stats.CHA}
Skills {conjure.Skills}
Senses {conjure.Senses}
Languages {conjure.Languages}
{conjure.Description.map((description) => (

{description.label} {description.value}

))}

Actions

{conjure.Actions.map((action, i) => (

{action.label} {action.sublabel} {action.description}

))}

Bonus Actions

{conjure.BonusActions.map((ba, i) => (

{ba.label} {ba.sublabel} {ba.description}

))}
); } } export default SmallStatBlock;
